get.description: Retrieve a list of countries from the database and return it as a JSON response.

country_code: The country code field is required.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific country by ID

country_code: The country code field is required.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the country to delete

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of countries with the specified quantity per page.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific country by code

get.description: Retrieve a list of classes from the database and return it as a JSON response.

requestBody.description: Classe object that needs to be added to the store

get.summary: Retrieve a specific classe by ID
get.description: Retrieves details of a classe based on its ID.

put.summary: Update a specific classe by ID
put.description: Updates details of a classe based on its ID.

requestBody.description: Classe object that needs to be updated

delete.summary: Delete a specific classe by ID
delete.description: Deletes a classe based on its ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of courses from the database and return it as a JSON response.

post.description: Creates a new course with course code, name, and image.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific course by ID
get.description: Retrieves details of a course based on its ID.

put.description: Updates an existing course with course code, name, and optional image.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to be updated

delete.summary: Delete a specific course by ID
delete.description: Deletes a course based on its ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all course registrations along with associated user, course, and class information.

post.description: Registers a user for a course. Requires 'class_id' and 'course_id' in the request body.

message.example: You have already registered for this course in this class

post.description: Authenticate user by providing email and password.

error.example: The provided credentials do not match our records.

post.description: Registers a new user by providing the required information and sends an activation email to the user upon successful registration.

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your email for activation instructions.

first_name: The first name field is required.

get.description: Activate user account by providing activation token.

post.description: Send a password reset email to the specified email address.

requestBody.description: Email address to send the password reset link.

post.description: Reset the user password using the provided token and new password.

requestBody.description: Information needed to reset the password.

email.description: The email address of the user

password_confirmation.description: The confirmation of the new password

put.description: Update the user profile information including avatar, phone number, first name, last name, and address.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users from the database and return it as a JSON response.

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user, invalidating the current JWT token.
